issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: The value of 'sourceDestCheck' as part of the DescribeInstances call returns null.  The value can be found via DescribeInstanceAttributes, howerver.  AWS returns the proper value.
fields.summary: DescribeInstances API request does not populate 'sourceDestCheck' field

comments.body: The source/destination check instance property is now set for instances running in a VPC.

The sourceDestCheck element is now returning a value in DescribeInstances {code} [a-20:~]euca-describe-instances i-8a4bc514 --debug 2016-06-09 10:31:47,756 DEBUG DescribeInstances parsed arguments:
